column5: Where can I download - from a safe site- a 'safe' MKV file player.  I've got a few movies of this type but not a player for them.  Any experiance / recomendations?  Thanks Entropy
Try VLC Media Player. It plays most video files.  http://vlc-media-player.en.softonic.com/
VLC,  whatever doesnt play on there, SM Player.
Download XenonMKV and it will convert all your mkv files to mp4,which will play pretty much on anything.
KMPlayer is probably the best to use. You can change aspect ratios and many other things but it is simpler than VLC. Also if on IPhone get AVPlayer and all movies can play on your Apple product.
I use VLC on the computer...  The sony Blu-ray players read everything...  put it on a thumb drive and plug it in and you're good to go
